security&nbsp;<br>&nbsp;</span></div><div style=""><span style="font-size: 20px; font-weight: normal;">&nbsp; - Isolated from the user interface (frontend)&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div><div style=""><span style="font-size: 20px; font-weight: normal;">&nbsp; - Multi-factor authentication&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div><div style=""><span style="font-size: 20px; font-weight: normal;">&nbsp; - Network restrictions&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div><div style=""><span style="font-size: 20px; font-weight: normal;">&nbsp; - etc.</span></div>" files&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div><div style=""><span style="font-size: 20px; font-weight: normal;"><br></span></div><div style=""><br></div>"
